text: Paolo Lorenzi was the defending champion but chose not to participate. João Souza won the title after defeating Laslo Đere 6–4, 7–6(7–4) in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw International Tennis Tournament of Cortina - Singles
title: 2016 International Tennis Tournament of Cortina – Singles
